website_summaries.verdict: Thoughtfully designed, this teething toy might just be the perfect fit for babies who have rejected the rest.
pros: Boasts an excellent balance of firmness and pliability for little ones to sink their gums into with satisfaction
Bumps and lumps for textile stimulation
Lots of protruding bits for babies to find the right chewing fit
Dishwasher safe and free of harmful chemicals
cons: Can be a tad heavy or large for single-handed use

customer_reviews.title: My Baby's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have several teething toys. Some are too hard. Some are too soft. Some won't go far enough into my baby's mouth to do any good. Some go so far that they frequently gag her. This one is just right. She loves gnawing on the "horns" (apparently they're actually ossicones) and the feet. Both of my daughter's teeth highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: SJHinMD

customer_reviews.title: Serious doubts with the safety
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy, but I have recently realized that she is able to make tiny parts of the material to come off while chewing. She does not even have teeth yet, hence one star for the safety of this product
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Highest recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: So, it feels weird to enjoy a teether this much, but this will absolutely be my go to gift for babies going forward. It's incredibly thoughtfully designed, no part of it can go far enough into baby's mouth to gag her, it's easy to clean without worrying about water pooling and mold growing (paranoid first time mama, here!) and there are just enough things going on with different textures to keep it interesting for her. Love this company, their story and email communication are fun, funny and useful. Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome teether! Definite must have!!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves this! She's 8 months old and has been teething for what seems like forever! We have lots of teethers, but she got this one for Christmas and is by far her favorite. The little things on the top of its head are nice because they can reach in the back of her mouth. She chews on the ears, legs, and really anything that she can fit in her mouth. I think she also likes it because it's a lot bigger than the other ones she has. (Also makes it easier to find. 😉😉) The color is very vibrant, as well... I'd definitely recommend this for any kiddos out there that are teething!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This teether is exactly what my 6 mo old grandson needed. It catches his attention so he wants to reach for it.... It's really grippable, do he can grab it and put it in his mouth easily and even move it around without dropping it. The texture is exactly what his aching little gums need. There are little bumps and raised lines in every possible spot for rubbing his gums on.... Very well thought out design! He, his momma, and I could not be more please with this teether!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard for baby to handle
customer_reviews.text: This teether isn’t very easy for a 4-5 month old to hold so I recommend an older child. He would drop it after 30 seconds or so and I had to keep picking it back up and giving it to him. Also there’s no way to secure it with a pacifier clip which would’ve made it a lot easier to keep in his reach and a handle would’ve been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keirstonmarie

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.text: So apart from the hilarious emails the company sends you regarding this product, it is as nice as everyone says it is. My 8 month old likes to whack everyone and everything with it as much as he gnaws on it like a ravenous beaver. It's adorable, and lightweight, so he can carry it everywhere. True to color, true to the pictures. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to buy a giraffe-shaped teether, this isn't the one you should buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be just as effective as other, more expensive teethers...but it's not. My 6 month old daughter can't chew on it very well at all. The shape, texture and size all contribute to its ineffectiveness. It doesn't have any large parts that stick out for her to easily bite down on and it's difficult for her to hold it in her hands. I've discovered that all of my babies' favorite teethers are hollow (which this one isn't). Simply put, you're much better off spending the money and paying up for Sophie the Giraffe.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable teether - baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Baby liked so much that I ordered a second one. His little gums are hurting now and he loves it right out of the freezer. My 4 month old baby grandson really loves this. He wasn't fond of pacifiers, mostly "ate" his little hands. I think he's going to like this for a long time. I ordered a second one to keep as backup. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Flat and hard
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves to chew on everything but she wasn't really into this one. It's very flat and the material is a bit harder than expected. Not worth the price. Instead try this:  My baby really likes the Safety 1st Mombella - it's soft, easy for baby to hold, and only $5 - she really enjoys chewing on the Mombella Elephant.
customer_reviews.author: Eski

customer_reviews.title: Sophie who?
customer_reviews.text: With my first child, had to have the Sophie. My son didn't like the giraffe and it ended up at the bottom on the diaper bag. I so so wish I had known about this teething toy with him. There are so many different nubs for my second baby to chew on, and she loves it. I love that it is a solid piece and is very easy to clean. She can also grab it very easily, and rotate it around to whichever nub she prefers that day. I have already given this to one new mom, and plan on this being my standard gift to any new moms. Buy this teething toy—you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CRG SBS,CO

customer_reviews.title: OK but Not Gracie's favorite, yet.
customer_reviews.text: Great granddaughter not crazy about this but it is something she will pickup and use. I have also purchased the teething mitten and she will use it but not crazy about it yet. Keep introducing to her every chance I get and believe eventually she will use both. I would love to get the giraffe that runs about $29 but that seems a bit expensive. I think she would use it and guess if I had purchased that first I have spent that much on the two items I did purchase. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Kirkendoll

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to grab for little hands and giraffe horns are ...
customer_reviews.text: My little guy started really getting into this teether just now (he is 5.5 months). It's easy to grab for little hands and giraffe horns are so delicious to chew. So I believe. Easy to clean. Easy to store. Simple design which I love. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teether and goes pretty much everywhere with us! Although it is on the pricier side of teether's, it well worth it. I love that it is BPA Free, PVC Free, Lead Free, easy to wash and my baby loves it, all of which were very important to me. We have other teether's and most of them have little crevices that are basically impossible to really clean and collect gunk, this one doesn't have that issue. We use a toy clip with this and the baby chews on it when we are out and about, which keeps her happy. It's also really cute. I highly recommend this teether
customer_reviews.author: C Grove

customer_reviews.title: Favorite teether, but can cause gagging
customer_reviews.text: This is our 5 month old's favorite teething toy! As many have expressed, it's the perfect hardness and has so many great edges and knobs for him to chew on. Great size for baby's mouth and it's also easy for him to hold by himself. Other positives: bright yellow color (as shown in picture), no place for mold to grow, durable and dishwasher safe. One word of caution -- he does gag rather easily (causing him to vomit) when using this (especially on the ossicones) so we usually wait a while to give it to him after he eats.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Teething toy of the century
customer_reviews.text: So we just got it like literally 10 minutes ago. I cleaned it, checked it for any smell or crack etc. then gave it to my 6 month old who has been fussy and clingy all day, teething, driving me crazy, and she went silent just gnawing on it and babbling. Hip hip hooray for a teething toy that keeps her happy. We have gone through so many teething toys so this is worth the money. Hopefully it continues to work its magic will check back in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It was worth every penny! Bought 6 different teething toys for my little guy and this one is our fav. We loved it so much I ordered one for my friend who just had a baby who is not teething yet. Even though I forgot to use my discount that came with my first purchase on my second order I'm pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CCJE

customer_reviews.title: For toddlers too
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! He is 2 and the revenge of the molars (the second set of molars) is a difficult teething stage for him. He has been chewing on everything. He loves to chew on this thanks to the different raised parts and it reaches the back teeth. When he starts chewing on random toys and/or furniture, I tell him to go get his giraffe. And, the company sent a very nice email.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 months with zero teeth buuuut they are coming. So I ordered this. It’s great. So easy to clean and she loves it. I highly recommend. We have the teal color. I give it to her while she’s in the high chair so she’s occupied after she’s has her meal and I can clean the kitchen. So it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Aarika Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (8 months) LOVES this teether. She will chew on it longer then any of her other choice. I wish it had a way to attach a hook or loop to it in order to keep it from falling. I plan to look for a Paci string/clip that will hook around the giraffes neck. I almost gave it four stars for this reason, but I don't want to discourage anyone from buying it. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite teething toy!
customer_reviews.text: This has become our favorite teething toy! I purchased this for my six month old daughter. She is my fourth baby, and this is by far the best toy I have purchased for teething. She is able to hold it on her own. It is a good size for her mouth. She can fit both horns in her mouth at the same time allowing relief for both sides of her mouth. Multiple spots in the mouth can be reached with this toy! Just wipe clean and it is ready to go. We don’t go without it. I would buy it again and again and will recommend it to all my mommy friends!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann Orkis

customer_reviews.title: My go-to baby shower gift after grandchildren proved its worth
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toy for teething babies. After I bought one for each of my grandchildren, it has become one of the toys I buy for every baby shower. It's easy for infants to hold, once they can hold things. It's easy for them to get it into their mouths, and seems to really soothe sore gums.
customer_reviews.author: KLG

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best either that we have found! Are the little horns on a giraffe head are perfect for giving kids the surface to chew on. All along a different textures for them to work with. The material itself is easy to hold and it is lightweight enough for my baby to lift it and manipulate it. I would buy this again for anyone having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Patrick Wane

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for SURE! My 7.5 month old puts everything in his mouth. He isn't too picky with what textures or items he chews on, but he does have favorites. When we received this toy I washed it and handed it to him. He chewed and held onto it for 20 minutes! Then cried when it dropped. He LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Good teething toy, a little hard to hold for 4 month old
customer_reviews.text: This is quite large, which is a good aspect of the product and a bad one for little hands. My son is almost 4 months old and he does love chewing on it but it is a little hard for him to hold onto because of its size. But I know as he gets bigger he will have an easier time. But, I do like this rather than Sophia the giraffe because that one I have seen pictures of mold inside of it. This one is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Genna Mainardi

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old loves it! He has been teething and I was having trouble finding something for him to teeth on. He doesn't like cold and everything else I tried seemed to be too hard or he couldn't hold onto it. This is easy for him to grasp and he loves to chew on the little antlers! Well worth the money. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the teether of his dreams!
customer_reviews.text: 6 month-old who is teething fiercely LOVES this thing. We have been through so many tethers and this is by far the stand-winner. Unlike many other tethers, there are no hard parts on this guy. Seems super comfy to chew on. It also doesn’t collect hair like other silicone-based tethers.
customer_reviews.author: Kellisi

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart first day
customer_reviews.text: Looks huge and thick, but my son literally ripped the kegs off the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Teether
customer_reviews.text: The BEST teether I've had, My second son loves the teether and chewing on the antlers and ears. Easy to hold. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kykim41042

customer_reviews.title: Great teething toy
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this I was hesitant because of the price. It's a good size and the material is nice. I was worried it would cling to hair and lint but it doesn't. I got one that was faulty and wrote to the seller and got it replaced no problem. That's what I like is that if I spend and something isn't right is the seller willing to back their product and these people are. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Teether!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this teether!! It is so easy for him to grasp and he loves to nibble every part of it, the ears, feet, and antlers. I bought it for him when he was 3 months old, now he's 1 year and he still loves it. I have purchased other teething toys, but this remains his favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teething heaven
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised... as soon as my teething 8 mo granddaughter got her hands on it, it was in her mouth and she was happily gnawing on it. Did not cause her to gag or choke (by her pushing it too far into her mouth). She loves it - and therefore so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Arcacia Oaks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! My son is 6 months and loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! My son is 6 months and loves the color. It's easy to grab and the knobs and nooks provide lots of comfort for him. Received quickly and the seller sent a nice follow up email to make sure I received it. I also received access to an ebook! Great company-will definitely be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: KimmerP511

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this, and she’s a picky about her teething toys
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first, but boy am I glad I got this teether for my daughter. It’s hard to find a teether with the right material that’s not too hard and not too giving. I could’ve save a ton of money if I would’ve found this teether weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: beth long

customer_reviews.title: Lots of areas to chew - easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful teether. It has many different "surfaces" for the baby to gnaw on. The toy is pretty easy for the baby to hold, but she drops it often. I wish it had a hole or opening in it so I could put a toy "leash" on it (to keep it from falling to the floor). The teether is not too hard or too soft. I recommend this toy! Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite teether. I mean she is 13 months old so she didn't exactly tell me that but I can tell that she enjoys this one more than the others that we have. Very durable and cleans up nice. The only down side is ther is no loop to tie it securly. We usually just wrap one of the straps that we have around it but sometimes my daughter can get that loose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frank

customer_reviews.title: 5 month old loves this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this teether! I've tried so many others and they just couldn't reach where she wanted the pressure. It's a little awkward for her to hold but shes in love with this so much
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable! I bought it for my brand new grandson
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This is adorable! I bought it for my brand new grandson, so he won't be able to enjoy it for a little while yet. The best part was the email I received from Bambeado! I will definitely recommend this company to friends and family. Your after-purchase marketing is the best! I hope everyone isn't too exhausted from the celebration. Sending you positive energy and love.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best teether by far!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old grandson loves his giraffe teether! Any way he grabs it is easy for him to put a part in his mouth to chew on! This is his favorite teether! Well worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy and Keith

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Among three babies, not one has any interest in this toy. Possibly because there aren't many gum massaging textures, possibly because it is somewhat flat compared to other teething toys.
customer_reviews.author: Grania

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before buying this and they were spot on. The parts aren't so long that your kid will gag and the rubber is bendy enough and not too hard. I am sure not every child will love it, but it is very well made and the bright colors are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fleischhauer

customer_reviews.title: Certainly seems strong/durable!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have chewed on this thing occasionally (neurological disorder is helped by varying sensory input), and it certainly seems solid to me! I do wonder about the length of the giraffes horns as a possible choking hazard for babies, but I'm guessing that has been considered in designing the product.
customer_reviews.author: HearAndThere

customer_reviews.title: Good teether for later months
customer_reviews.text: My son is just over six months old and is finally able to handle this easily. It is long and when I first gave it to him a month ago the ear of the giraffe kept going into his eye, or nose, or wherever he could get it. Fun and functional, but definitely not his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great teether! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is my baby's favorite teething toy! It's soft but firm, has ridges to help with holding and with chewing. He loves to use the horns for the teeth coming in a little farther back and used the feet for the front teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Our little one loved it. It's a cute design and it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little one loved it. It's a cute design and it had several different textures for the infant to bite and chew. Too bad we lost it but since she is growing out of it, no reason to replace. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetsnMore

customer_reviews.title: Babies love chewing... great price... super simple cleaning! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Babies love chewing on these... I have purchased them for three little ones and a second round to be left at the babysitter's house. They are easy for little ones to hold and just a quick warm water soapy wash is all it takes when they land on the ground. Awesome!! I highly recommend this product. The seller is awesome too!
customer_reviews.author: smith

customer_reviews.title: Good but not best
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is a piece of rubber. It seems to do its job , but my baby has other tethers and among others , unfortunately, this is not his favorite. Maybe they need to add more colors to it.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandbaby!
customer_reviews.text: My 6-month-old grandson has his first 2 teeth and will put ANYTHING in his mouth to help soothe his gums. This, however, is one of his favorite teething toys. He especially loves chewing on the giraffe's horns! I appreciate how easy it is to clean and the fact that there are no hard parts.
customer_reviews.author: ShoesyChoosey!

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it so much he made me want one myself. The design and texture is well thought out. He loves to gnaw on the Giraffe "antlers" the most.
customer_reviews.author: Hobby RX

customer_reviews.title: baby easily choked with all the parts and no round parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Too big for babies hands, baby easily choked with all the parts and no round parts for easy holding.
customer_reviews.author: Sicis72

customer_reviews.title: Maybe other babies like it, but mine did not
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get this to dry clean. Every so I'm used, and even after running the dishwasher leaves a white film on it. Also my teething son hated it so I can't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: This teether feels like it’s well made but didn’t do it for my 6 month old that was sprouting teeth every 2-3 weeks or so for several months. He just wasn’t interested. But it’s cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! But it!
customer_reviews.text: At first it was ok, but as she got older and started teething even more, this teether became her favorite. It’s our go to. Our daughter is 8 months old and this toy is a must have. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Must have for teething baby!
customer_reviews.text: My little one took to this right away. I was hesitant to buy mainly because of the price, but this teether is great quality and Dad was happy that it passed all the safety standards. I finally purchased and I am so happy I did! I highly recommend and no understand the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mely B

customer_reviews.title: Good teething toy
customer_reviews.text: The product was too heavy for my child until he was older than 6 months and since my son started teething early, it wasn’t a good option until he was older... however, it worked well and was very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: if we held it for him he enjoyed it for short amounts of time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my son was 3 months because he was an early teether. He was a little too small for it at the time, if we held it for him he enjoyed it for short amounts of time, but now that he's 5 months and can hold things and bring them to his mouth on his own he seems to be enjoying it much more. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: She loves it easy to sanitize I don’t know if this teether has anything to do with it but when you give it to her and she stops Crying
customer_reviews.author: Frank S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for teething
customer_reviews.text: Its cute however its best if it has a hole to make it as a necklace so it won’t fall out of baby’s hand and gets dirty. My baby likes chewing on it and play with it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Andrew and the folks deserve the greatest appreciation for the care taken in packaging and sending ...
customer_reviews.text: Andrew and the folks deserve the greatest appreciation for the care taken in packaging and sending little Bam Bam. The recipient, while too young to personally express her delight, will love her new tether! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Effective teether that's easy for babies to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Both of our 8 month old twins love this toy, and it seems to help them with their teething (Tooth #4 for one and #2 for the other). They also like the bright color, and it's easy for me to find when they inevitably drop it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Robinson

customer_reviews.title: My DD has 4 teeth coming in. My husband ...
customer_reviews.text: My DD has 4 teeth coming in. My husband and I bought her a variety of teething toys. The only thing she wants is a wash cloth I wet and put in the freezer, until we got this guy. She loves this thing. It really helps with her teething.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT teether!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are just entering the teething stage, and still learning how to hold onto objects. “Bam Bam” is so easy to hold and LO is figuring out how to get the antennas in her mouth. So far that’s the favorite part to chew on. I hope they restock the magenta soon!!
customer_reviews.author: S Hoekenga

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it !!!
customer_reviews.text: His eyes light up when he sees the giraffe, automatically grasps it and put it in his mouth and starts to chew it, he loves gnawing on the horns. Now teeth are starting to come out little by little, so this teether helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Carmai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teething
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. She just chews away for hours & it gives her relief! It’s easy to clean & is a good price.
customer_reviews.author: JAY301

customer_reviews.title: Cute but has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Cute, decent size, but baby didn't really fall in love with it like we hoped. Wish it had a loop or hole so we could use tether with a paci clip. Constantly falling on floor then having to reclean. Attracts lint and fibers from clothes and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter's Favorite Teether!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the price of this teether scare you. It's worth every penny! It is super durable and fuzz/hair/etc. does not stick to this like other teethers. It is so easy to clean and my daughter loved chewing on the giraffe's antlers. I loved it so much, I ordered the blue one for my teething nephew!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Ude

customer_reviews.title: Baby not interested
customer_reviews.text: Baby has no interest in using this for a teething ring! At least for now. Maybe later It’s cute but not useful.
customer_reviews.author: amazongull6

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this toy! She can hold it easily and loves to chew it but only on its antennas
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite teething toy
customer_reviews.text: Our girl is 6 months old, and she adores this teething toy! We’ve had it a week and I’ve already purchased another one as a backup for her diaper bag. She can hold it easily, and loves the different shapes to chew on. It’s also incredibly easy to clean. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So well designed...no visual interest
customer_reviews.text: Lots of awards, great textures, lengths. I love it, I just wish my baby did. I cant get her interested in it. Maybe the same idea in a black and yellow bumblebee would give her the visual interest the rest of her toys do with the high contrast. I'd buy that again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing that I brought for my 6 months old ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby L_O_V_E_S it! This is the best thing that I brought for my 6 months old baby so far. Other stuff like rings/keys just didn't work at all. We also very happy with the bright color (we have green).it is 100% as on the picture and material very gentle for baby's mouth. Thanks, Bambeado, great job!
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy Shevchenko

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for teething, sometimes we even freeze it to help numb our baby’s gums
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: His mother says it's nice sized and he holds it easily as well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a young child in the throws of teething, my last photo has him cramming it in his mouth I would say it's a success! His mother says it's nice sized and he holds it easily as well....He's 4 months old....
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: The best product for babies!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My granddaughter is 4 months. She loves to hold it and chew on it. It's exactly what they advertise! The price is worth it! A must have for anyone expecting a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Maizeedaizee

customer_reviews.title: It works, toddler loves it in his mouth automatically.
customer_reviews.text: Love the neon green, easy to see, find, simple to clean. No choking, gagging.
customer_reviews.author: lmbermudez

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Round 2! My mother-in-law got my daughter the orange version as soon as her teeth started sprouting. It was her favorite so of course it got lost. So I just had to buy her a second onein turquoise. It was like her long lost friend had just returned from an adventure with a makeover. They are perfect for teething beginning to end. Great for when the front teeth and the back and she can move it easily to where ever she wants to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cute teether but didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: My wife was so hyped about this product after reading its reviews but unfortunately our teething baby was not interested in it at all. Cute product but didn’t work for us. No smell, easy to clean but need a little hole to hook this teether so it’s not always falling on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Roman

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool teether
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool teether, but I can't give it a 5 star simply because my baby isn't a fan of anything silicone, I even have to special order her rubber nipples for her bottles. But otherwise it's a good teether.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my picky baby
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been super picky with the toys she will play with so I was relieved when she shoved this cute little giraffe right in her mouth when we got it. It is soft, not too heavy and easy to clean. It is perfect for a little teething baby!
customer_reviews.author: RELLEC

customer_reviews.title: Great teether.
customer_reviews.text: Li'l Bam Bam is one of our favorite toys. Easy to hold, fun to chew, and the turquoise color is pleasing to look at. Definitely worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Potions and Secrets

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves BamBam
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this toy. Easy for him to hang onto and he loves chewing on it's little nubs. We have to keep a bib on him bc he just drools everywhere. Super glad we bought this! The email we received about it being sent to us from the company was really funny, too...make sure you read it :)
customer_reviews.author: ccc1184

customer_reviews.title: Best teething giraffe!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old is obsessed with his Bam Bam! The size is perfect for him to hold on to and the shape hasn't caused any gagging like other teething toys! The emails from the company were hilarious. I would definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Part for my grandson for my daughter she said he loves it
customer_reviews.author: G. BROWN

customer_reviews.title: What’s best about this is my son doesn’t choke
customer_reviews.text: What’s best about this is my son doesn’t choke. He is 6 mos old and I barely gave this to him because he would always choke while eating his hands. I love how he can easily hold it. It’s very light and the contours are easy to hold. It’s a quick clean up too. Whenever he drops it, I’ll just wash with soap and water. The funny this is, this teether makes him sleepy while eating it.
customer_reviews.author: adiepie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile teething toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our baby and she loves it - at least as much as Sophie. I keep it in the freezer at home and snap a travel cord around it when we are on the road.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter just loves this I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just my baby, but he doesn't find it very interesting or something he likes to chew on. He likes the infantino lion bettee. It doesn't really have good grip to it
customer_reviews.author: Janaan Sabree

customer_reviews.title: ... was too small to understand it and did not like it at all
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this my son was too small to understand it and did not like it at all. I recently brought it back out and it is his favorite teething toy.
customer_reviews.author: sara Massari

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to be everything the reviews said ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be everything the reviews said it was. My son only seemed interested in it for a hot second and even would throw it in frustration when teething. Every baby is so different. It is a well made very cute product. I am hoping down the road he will want it for some of his back teeth.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My 11-month old likes this, though not his favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My 11-month old likes this teether, though not his favorite. A little surprising since it made of the same material as the teething necklace we have and loves that, but he gets bored with this one. Easy to clean, though.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani T

customer_reviews.title: Clean product
customer_reviews.text: Overall cute product that is easy to clean. Wasn’t my babies top choice of tethers but she did like the top parts that stuck out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toys so much!! It’s super easy to clean. I just pop it in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month old got this for christmas. She loves the shape, color and all the different little nubbies. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like that this teether is a bit on the bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby is now 6 months old and his teeth are starting to break through. I like that this teether is a bit on the bigger side, so it's easy for him to hold and he can bite on it at different angles. He's had it for about 2 months now and is quite rough with it...it's pretty durable. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cris Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Bingo!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby at 8 months and although she didn’t love it at first bc she didn’t have any teeth, she started REALLY loving it once she did!!! Super durable, fun and easy to clean! Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Varley

customer_reviews.title: the material feels really good on teething gums
customer_reviews.text: My 7.5 month old daughter loves this! the material feels really good on teething gums.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky lady

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids that love sucking their toys, this one it’s perfect for them to calm teeth eruption
customer_reviews.author: Estefania G.

customer_reviews.title: At 6 months who knows if he likes it but he won't let it go.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson. At first he didn't take to it so well but after a few days the thing is never out of his hands. He's only 6 months so he can't tell us he likes it but he seems to. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Mata

customer_reviews.title: Get this for teething babies!
customer_reviews.text: My teething son absolutely loves his "raffe". He chews on every part but seems to particularly enjoy gnawing on the antlers. His little chubby fingers hold this teething toy with no issues. It's easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: F is for Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product, but my kid didn't take to it
customer_reviews.text: I have a teething baby and he sort of liked this. For about 10 minutes. The product itself felt very good for a teething baby, but for whatever reason, my little guy didn't care.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

product_meta.title: Baby Teething Toy Extraordinaire - Little Bambam Giraffe Teether Toys by Bambeado. Our BPA Free Teethers Help take The Stress Out of Teething, from Newborn Baby Through to Infant - Magenta
feature_bullets: SAVE YOUR SANITY - When your wee bubby is teething the whole household can be put under STRESS, lots and lots of it! Our Little Bam Bam teether toys can help reduce that stress for all, allowing you to enjoy this wonderful period with your child rather than wishing it away.

PROVIDE RELIEF FOR BUBBIES SORE GUMS - All babies instinctively want to chew on whatever they can get their little hands on when the teeth start to push through. Made from soft, chewable, baby-safe silicone, Little Bam Bam baby teether toys are the perfect texture for those tender gums – we call it the Goldilocks Zone, not too hard and not too soft, just perfect.

LOTS OF COLOR, LOTS OF TEXTURE - We have put a lot of thought into the look at feel of Little Bam Bam baby teethers. The ears, legs and horns are just the right size for little hands to hold and the bright color will help stimulate your baby. Why buy boring teething rings when the Bambeado range of teethers for infants and baby teething toys are just so much more fun for teething babies.

NO NASTIES - Single molded product, so there are no cracks or joins for bacteria to accumulate. Certified BPA Free, PVC Free, Lead Free. When it comes to newborn toys or baby teething toys you can't be too careful.

SAFE SAFE SAFE - Little bamBAM teething toys conform with all required safety standards. The ultimate pacifier for cutting teething through to molars. As good as Sophie, for half the price. Pop in Freezer for additional pain relief. Lifetime Guarantee with all of our products.
